Package index

All functions

as.wesp_site()
Convert a data.frame of WESP question responses to a wesp_site
assign_jenks_score()
Assign Jenks score based on calibration dataset
calc_indicators()
Calculate Indicators for WESP assessment site
calculate_jenks_score()
Calculate Jenks Breaks
calculate_multi_site()
Calculate indicators for multiple sites
calibration_scores
WESP calibrated site values
check_indata()
Check the input data for basic QA
combine_rawdata()
Combine all types of raw data
format_rawinputs()
Format raw inputs This function cleans, formats and combines raw outputs from field and desktop analysis survey123 forms.
get_derived_values()
Retrieve all derived values from a wesp_site object as a data.frame.
get_indicator_scores()
Retrieve indicator scores from a wesp_site object as a data.frame.
get_responses()
Retrieve all input responses from a wesp_site object as a data.frame.
import_spatial_data()
Download base spatial information layers to support desktop analysis for Wespr
load_wesp_data()
Load the data containing the responses to WESP form
record_values()
Validate and record responses into a standard object This is an internal function to generate wesp class object
